title: Crime Alert 08.15.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.15.18
description:
New charges filed against alleged Golden State serial killer. A deadly shooter who claimed protection under Florida's Stand Your Ground law now charged. Four West Virginia judges impeached over "wild" allegations.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
